column4: hello all!! my laptop is suffering from sound problems. all of a sudden the sound stops working. right now also sound isnt working. anything we can do about it?
have a go through the suggestions in this guide
ok thanks a lot. i am going through it

thanks. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=205449 is an awesome guide. i learnt something new from it. unfortunately, i still couldnt turn on my sound. the problem is not absence of sound. the problem is disappearing of sound.
